attributes.action: Ensure children have the right to remain in school without covid injection.
attributes.additional_details: Children should NOT be denied access to education just because their parents have refused the vaccine. Childrens rights include the right to life, survival and development. the right to have their views respected and to have their best interests considered at all times. the right to a name and nationality, freedom of expression and access to information about them. We request the government to respect decisions of parents who refuse the vaccine ensurinv they are not denied access to education.
attributes.background: Matt hancock said the he was looking closely at "no jab no school"
